name: Keep Off the Edge
description:
Tap your way through the intricate zigzag path without hitting off the edges! 
Sounds easy? Better think twice.
From the developers of the insanely challenging Hardest Game Ever 2, comes yet another intense game armed with high-speed action: KEEP OFF THE EDGE!
Keep Off The Edge is a fast-paced action game that will push your skills to the limit! Feel the adrenaline rush as you experience the uncanny progression in every level!
The game that will leave you FRUSTRATED, but in a GOOD WAY!
Join the Zigzag Revolution. KEEP OFF THE EDGE.
DOWNLOAD NOW!
